id: In Montana, group uses fly fishing to help vets
paragraph: By Jeremy Harlan and Kim Berryman, CNNUpdated 5:44 PM ET, Mon November 12, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Bozeman, Montana (CNN)For a few hours on a sun-soaked autumn morning, Dan McGuinness stands ankle-deep in Montana's idyllic Sixteen Mile Creek. His thoughts focus on casting a fly lure to the perfect spot, drawing the attention of spawning brown trout just upstream. It's his moment of zen.
